title: Setting Up
text: Set up three equations in variable form to represent the situation. Assuming x is smaller, y is middle and z is larger we have $$x=0.5z$$, $$y=0.75z$$, and $$x+y+z=108$$

title: Simplifying to 1 Variable
text: Plug in the expressions for x and y into the equation $$x+y+z=108$$ and combines the z-values.

title: Solving for z
text: Using division solve for z from the previous expression

title: Solvingn for y
text: Plug in the value of z into the original expression for y

title: Solvingn for x
text: Plug in the value of z into the original expression for x
